Title: ADNOC LNG offers one cargo loading in end-March; India’s Gail seeks two April-May cargoes
Description: ADNOC LNG is offering one cargo that will load on Mar. 26-30 at its 5.8 mtpa Das Island LNG plant in Abu Dhabi, while India’s Gail has returned to the spot market to seek a total of two cargoes for delivery in April and May. Their tenders close tomorrow.
Author: CK

Title: Spain’s El Musel LNG terminal begins open season today for capacity bookings
Description: Spain’s gas transmission operator Enagas will begin the open season today for capacity bookings at its El Musel LNG import terminal in Gijon, in the country’s Asturias region, bringing the facility closer to beginning commercial operations.
Author: CK
